Package org.apache.ignite.ml.preprocessing.maxabsscaling

Contains Max Abs Scaler preprocessor.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MaxAbsScalerPartitionData
    Partition data used in maxabsscaling preprocessor.
    MaxAbsScalerPreprocessor<K,V>
    The preprocessing function that makes maxabsscaling, transforms features to the scale [-1,+1].
    MaxAbsScalerTrainer<K,V>
    Trainer of the maxabsscaling preprocessor.

Package org.apache.ignite.ml.preprocessing.maxabsscaling Description

Contains Max Abs Scaler preprocessor.
